channel.title: Plz plz plz plz help!
channel.description: ok so am trying to add a new wep and there no folder for models so i just add it to my own folder and put in client i add all the things to itemdef.java and when i trying spwan it does but i cant see it because the models are not there so how do i add the models to the server and when i go in game and i type add model 15867 nothing happens????? plz help someone???

item.title: Plz plz plz plz help!
